text: The Sørsund Bridge () is a bridge that crosses the Sørsundet strait between the islands of Kirkelandet and Innlandet in the town of Kristiansund which is in Kristiansund Municipality, Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. The bridge has 19 spans, with a main span of . The bridge opened in 1963 and it carries County Road 420. title: Sørsund Bridge
